website_summaries.verdict: A spacious metal workbench with some convenient extras, but its ability to hold up to heavy-duty jobs is questionable.
pros: In addition to the spacious  47.25 inch by 23.75 inch work surface, this bench has an impressive feature set that includes 2 storage drawers, shelf, peg board, and fluorescent lighting
cons: Not as durable as some competitors, so it's best for light-duty work

customer_reviews.title: Unstable
customer_reviews.text: Wow....after 3 hours of installation, the workstation (if that's what you want to call it) is sooooo unstable. It moves forward, backward and side to side almost 45 degrees. I am afraid the bars are going to bend. Flimsy material, particle pressed board.....very bad descision on my part. I was almost too embarrassed to write a review
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a garage workbench at our beach condo. I had read reviews that it was difficult to assemble and parts didn't line up, but I had no problem assembling this and am very happy with the end product. Don't get me wrong, there is some work to the assembly because there are 20+ parts and 100+ screws, so basically it's a giant Erector set! Completed bench is solid and is exactly what I wanted. If I had advice to help anyone assembling this, it would be to not tighten each screw as it's placed. You may need to adjust the parts, so best to do in stages as each is completed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip L Palmer

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING for the price
customer_reviews.text: The first thing you need to understand is this thing's $100. The bench in my old house cost 5x what this did and didn't do anything this thing doesn't. It's fairly cheaply made, but when fully assembled it works beautifully. The hardware isn't the best quality, but it's extremely easy to overcome. If you're looking for a good bench that doesn't need to hold up automatic transmissions, this is the bench for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Price over time.
customer_reviews.text: I had certain criteria when I was looking for a work bench. Sturdy, economical, peg board, and with a light. The instructions were not as difficult as other buyers make it seem. I did not have to drill or modify anything to make it work. The only downside is the assembly time. With pegboards and vice added, it took me about 4.5 hours to complete. But for the price I am pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not so bad with right mindset :)
customer_reviews.text: I love this workbench! Assembly did take a little brain power. I switched my music from Metallica to Duran Duran greatest hits and switched from monster to wine ... alllll was good! PROTIP: pretend to us only use this page as the instructions. I got a 2 hour foot rub from the Mr. AND dinner made for the family ;)
customer_reviews.author: tuesday coren

customer_reviews.title: MIssing parts and drawer broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: The light fixture that was to come with the workbench was not in the box anywhere. I was shorted about a dozen 6mm bolts, and worst of all, one of the drawer slides fell completely apart shortly after assembly. It's not fixable. I don't have the time to take this piece of garbage apart and send it back. Fortunately it's to be used for part finishing and airbrushing. Take my advice, AVOID OLYMPIA TOOLS. They have no QA, slipshod manufacturing and packaging practices, and their products wouldn't make the grade at a K-Mart that was going out of business.
customer_reviews.author: GojiraST

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly and not very stable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Daughter in law. They put it together last weekend and it is not stable at all and is very wobbly. I am going to take a look at it and see if it was assembled properly which I am reasonably sure it was as she WILL read the instructions. Will post more once I have figured out the issue. Part 2 The bench was assembled in accordance with the instructions bolted on 3/4" plywood supports on the sides and the back and the bench no longer wobbles. Had to spend an additional $20 + dollars to make a $120 + dollar workbench stable and usable. Save your money go to harbor freight.
customer_reviews.author: LeeRetArmy

customer_reviews.title: Days to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen such horrible instructions that were near to impossibe to interpret. The screws and bolts were not labled correctly and there were not enough of them to cover the whole work bench. I actually had to buy extra at the hardware store to finish it. The drawers to not slide easily and are quite difficult to remove once they are in. Also a very difficult task fitting the desk top onto the structure. Not as wobbly as some have said, but not totally solid and sturdy. It looks nice, but if you are planning to do heavy duty work on this, pass it by.
customer_reviews.author: Artie Martello

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench / Nightmare to build
customer_reviews.text: Finished product is nice. That said, the hardware and instructions are awful. Instructions are limited, at best. The instructions label the included hardware as A,B,C,etc., but the hardware is labeled M4, M5, M6, etc. - and it all looks similar. What should be a one hour build, took three hours. The bench is nice, if you can survive the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Olympia Tools 82-802 Multi-Purpose Workbench With Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice work table, very sturdy. Although the table top is particle board, it is easily replaced at a later date if you wish, with plywood. I do recommend this table for the home hobbyist. I have it in my garage. It will take you about 3 hours to put it together, there are good instructions, and each set of nuts, bolts and washers are in separate plastic bags, each labeled with the item number. I did see a previous video where the guy says it is not sturdy, and moves it with his finger. This is nonsense. My work bench is very sturdy, with all the bolts tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Rlstj

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t beat this product and deal. Assembly is easy but time consuming with lots of screws, nuts, and parts. Took about 2 hours. But extremely happy with the value of this tool bench. Would recommend to anyone looking for an entry level tool bench. The light is good quality and the power strip works well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: No Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the work bench and it has served me well as a work area in my garage. However, when we assembled it we noted that there were some missing parts, particularly the clamp that holds the light to the top shelf. I wrote the them and later called, only to be told that their email system is not working. The person to whom I spoke acted as if she never heard of the product. After checking with "a supervisor" she said they would send me the part. As expected, it never arrived. My advice: check for all parts before assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Buy something better
customer_reviews.text: I like the drawers underneath, the light, pegboard, and the outlet on the side. Those are convenient. But overall it's not a great work table. Although the pictures show you could mount a vise to the table, it feels much too flimsy for any real work. Probably most suitable for light duty work I'd advise others to avoid this table and buy a better quality workbench instead. It's worth spending a little more
customer_reviews.author: TW Moore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this workbench was supposed to be great. Great price. Very functional. Spent 3 hours putting it together. Seemed like everything was perfect. The first time I pulled the left drawer open, it fell out of the tracks and fell on the floor. Now apparently I need to spend 3 more hours taking it apart to return it ???? The left drawer slide piece is warped. I tried to fix it. Not possible. I don’t know what to do now. Maybe the manufacturer can send me a replacement part because taking it apart completely and repacking it to return seems like an absurd thing to do. Please help.
customer_reviews.author: 😔

customer_reviews.title: Takes Time To Put Together, But Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: As most have posted, it takes a while to assemble, as every piece requres about 2 nuts/bolts/washers, but its perfect for the value! It is sturdy, the WOOD tops are great quality, and the board works perfect for standard pegboard hookups. Not sure why most people had trouble/ issues with it.... it just takes patience and a needed #3 phillips, but once done its amazing for the value! would reccomend for anyone's garage!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Beyond frustrated
customer_reviews.text: This came without enough of the hardware to complete the assembly. There is no way to call anyone to ask for more outside of returning the item. I took account before the build only to find the assembly requires 8 more than is even included according to instructions. How would anyone know before they started building unless they are OCD enough to count the screws on each page. Ow I will have to go to Lowe’s to find the extra hardware.
customer_reviews.author: John Yeary

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same item that you can get from other companies and has just been rebranded.. It is OK for light duty but if you need a stronger unit, this is not it. It is OK to assemble and I was able to build it myself. The best selling point right now is that they have it in stock when nobody else seems to be able to get them. Would I buy again? Yes, if I need a general purpose light duty unit. BTW, DO NOT SLIDE the unit after assemble. The legs are not strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: David Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: The runners for the drawers were upside-down on the outer side of each drawer. Had to contact the maker, after lots of attitude and refusal to listen she finally shut up long enough for me to explain. They say they are sending me two new set of the sides. We will see.
customer_reviews.author: Emy

customer_reviews.title: Great bench
customer_reviews.text: This bench is ideal for light duty applications. I wouldn’t recommend this bench for use in a maintenance shop, but it’s great for a storage desk for your garage. Assembly was not hard, just a bunch of bolts. There is a video of someone complaining about how unstable this bench is: TIP : you have to tighten the bolts! My bench is sturdy when assembled with common sense and some elementary mechanical skills.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Drawers not stable.
customer_reviews.text: After an hour or so it appeared put together. Opened left drawer and it fell completely off on left side. Put it back in track and same thing happened. Have tried numerous times to get it to stay with no luck. Right drawer works fine. Called for assistance and was told it would be a $100 or more to have someone come and try to fix it. I guess I’ll just use it with only the right drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy unstable ......
customer_reviews.text: It took six hours to put together. Comes with a bunch of screws but doesn't tell you what screws to use for what! It's very flimsy. I have the screws as tight as possible. It still moves from front to back! I'm afraid it's going to collasp! Waste of money........I had to attach guide wires to the wall to keep it from falling forward. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Good light duty workbench.
customer_reviews.text: Good Light duty work bench. Great value. Sturdy. Two drawers open and close smoothly. The built in light is adequate and the electrical outlets are convenient. Easy to assemble. Good instructions. I’m slow and it took me an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Devsmi

customer_reviews.title: poor durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in May and by the end of September desk defunct. I had nothing more than a computer, printer, and paperwork on it; just moved it to refinish the floor and the leg bent. Super disappointing. Now I am out $100+ bucks and no desk. :(
customer_reviews.author: Adriel Gray

customer_reviews.title: Start with B screws :) ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.text: Like the look. Drawers are smooth and roomy. Although it is made of a delicate metal which bends easily it worked perfect as a place for my husband to store his tools, not necessarily strong enough to attach a vice grip, but great for storage and piddling around on.
customer_reviews.author: A. RUSS

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Looked at several brands of benches and this one looked to be the best value that matched the quality. It's only 4 pounds lighter than the most expensive brand, but still has the light and electric outlet the others offered. It's a very nice work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Pulled the pieces out of the packing box, one of the beams was already bent. Tried to put the thing together and several of the pieces bent while attempting to build the frame. Very flimsy metal I could bend with bare hands. Could not finish putting it together because frame was damaged from just trying to get it together. Going to end up sending it to the dump. Complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Monroe

customer_reviews.title: The assembly instructions Suck Big Time!!!
customer_reviews.text: After we assembled it we had a nice sturdy workbench. However, the assembly would have gone much better if the instructions were better. The illustrations are too small, and ambiguous. Bigger clearer pictures, and a better description of the assembly process would improve this product. Example, if it said "only insert the two screws on the side of the bracket. The back screws will be inserted later to hold the pegboard in place." Also, in this day and age, why are they providing a florescent light? The tubes are difficult to recycle, and led lights are more efficient and not toxic when broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: It showed up with bent pieces which made it challenging to assemble. I had to hammer and manually bend the pieces into shape. Such a big disappointment. I realized is was buying a discount item but this is still not worth the money. I would have been better off building one with some 2 X 4 lumber.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like my workbench!
customer_reviews.text: Once assembled I really like this workbench. The biggest challenge was that I had two parts that were improperly coded. I was able to eventually able to figure out. Also assembling the drawers was a bit of a challenge. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Warner

customer_reviews.title: Rad workbench
customer_reviews.text: I love this workbench!! It's exactly what I needed, and was a completely steal at $125 (not sure if it's still that price). It was indeed a bit tricky to put together, but I got it done by myself in under 3 hours. Once you tighten all the bolts it'll be super sturdy. Love it; would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a medium-sized workbench.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve St. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great Low Cost Work Bench
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy with the instructions. I was not happy with missing screws and parts that were bent in shipping. I am happy with the outcome. Great low cost work bench. I am going to buy another so I will have 2 side by side. If you are into "some assembly required" garage furniture, this is a great choice. A tip: For some reason on my kit the nuts seem to only thread on the screw from one side of the nuts. If you experience difficulties threading the nut just turn the nut around and it will thread just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Don Vellenga

customer_reviews.title: Flimpsy
customer_reviews.text: Drawers are loose, metal bent so the drawers fall out. the bench itself is nice but my husband has to glue the drawers shut so that no one opens them or they will fall through.
customer_reviews.author: Leibe

customer_reviews.title: Drawers
customer_reviews.text: Product is ok for general use , the drawers are worthless . keeps falling off tracks. the construction of the bench leaves something to be desired , the connections that hold it together are not fixed so when you move the bench they have a tendency to come out . Overall its ok , but given what I know now I probably would have spent all little more money and got a better quality product
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B.

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. The directions were crap. The labeling of all the screws are awful, it’s wobbly as hell and nothing lines up. Look at the drawers put in. I have been at this for over an hour putting this crap together wondering why I have such a huge gap on the drawers. And this isn’t my first time assembling. I put beds bookcases and desks together for my kids. This thing is just terrible.
customer_reviews.author: orange

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, heavy duty product.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy product, recipient loved it! Two problems; it was very difficult to assemble as the the screws are labeled, but the directions do not specify where to put which screw! My light assembly did not work. We tried a new bulb but still there was no service on the light. Am trying to contact the seller to replace the light assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ita great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is durable. The only issue is that one of the drawers, the metal bracket that is already installed does not align with the one on the drawer so it falls if you pull it put to far. Its almost like the frame might me wider on that end. Nothing I can really fi,. Other than that it is sturdy very much so. Love the light on the top and the outlets on the side, super cool
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Organize your DIY
customer_reviews.text: It has been a long needed item for my husband to do his DIY projects. Lots of storage when utilizing the back pegboard for containers and hooks. The included light and plug help out alot. The shelf on the bottom is great for storage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peverill

customer_reviews.title: a great compromise
customer_reviews.text: it's not rock solid but it will do the job for most typical workbench operations. The instructions are really well done with the exception that they don't tell you which bag (which is labeled) to use for a given screwing operation. However, you will figure it out quickly yourself. All parts are labeled with numbers and orientation. It's a good buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Esposito Mario

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light duty work bench
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bike mechanic by day, and this is perfect for what I need. This work bench serves as my clean work space where I work on electric bike components and have my laptop handy. ...also a great place for my hand tools that I need more regularly. It's perfect for what I use it for, but I wouldn't use this at the industrial level. I have a welded metal table with a large vise if I need something that can take hammer pounding.
customer_reviews.author: Ion M. Kirksey

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Opened the box and the tool bench was snapped in half. The corner was broken off and the part where you hang the tools was cracked. I was so disappointed. I am going to return it and hope the next one come in better shape!!
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: great value for the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: The work bench measured up to all it was cracked up to be. Assembly was very easy and the assembled bench is very sturdy. With the light over the work surface and the plugs on the side of the bench, this product is extremely nice. I felt sorry for the UPS driver when he delivered it. It was very, very heavy in the box, but he put it in my garage and did not let me help him. Great product for a great price. You need a work bench? No need to look any further unless you want something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo G.

customer_reviews.title: Take Your Time
customer_reviews.text: Lots of parts but take your time and don’t rush. There were no extra screws or nuts. Don’t tighten things up until you’re certain everything is in the right place. I secured mine to the wall. It took a couple hours to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small amount of tools kept in the garrage.
customer_reviews.text: The bench is pretty easy to assemble. My only complaint is that it is not as stable as I hoped. A little more reinforcing would make it better. Also, the draws sometimes come of the tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Ken T.

customer_reviews.title: I would pass on a second time.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect a perfect product based on price but it was a let down still. I had to bend metal to get it straight again. There were problems with fit and build. I had to force pieces together to get it to work and the top shelf that the light attached to is sags around 3 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Zambuto

customer_reviews.title: but the inclusion was relatively fine. The instruction for assembling is not good
customer_reviews.text: The package was damaged, but the inclusion was relatively fine. The instruction for assembling is not good, some time - confusing. For example fixing the front top panel, it is not clear if it goes inside or outside the side panels, The screws are shown from the front side even though they should go from the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Ephim Shirman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe all the bad reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of the reviews on this before I bought it. Let me tell you something, anyone who could not figure out which bolt to use when or couldn’t make it stable should be building things. Bags the bolts are in are labeled and the parts list is in the manual. Tighten every bit and bolt. Not just finger right either. Put on you big boy pants and do it. Thing was simple to put together. Lot of parts and lots of bolts but easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Ellrott

customer_reviews.title: Great value for hobbies.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting a lot for the price. A good workbench cost $300 or more. But I was pleasantly surprised. It took me about 2 hours to build by myself. It’s very sturdy, you just need to make sure you get all the screws tight. I just use it for a 3D printer, but I can imagine working on this would scratch the surface. You may consider buying a surface cover of some sort.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & functional but flimsy and difficult to put together
customer_reviews.text: We spent days putting this together but it does the job now that it is For a cheap option, it works and functions looks way more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.author: ECZ

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble. Very sturdy. I mounted a vice on the top table with no problems. The light is nice, drawers are smooth, electric plugs work as should. This is a great work table!
customer_reviews.author: Choe

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Tedious installation.
customer_reviews.text: I typically don’t leave reviews but I felt it was important for this product because there are so many conflicting reviews. This bench is heavy duty and very sturdy. No wobbling whatsoever. I use this as an armorers bench as well a workbench. The installation was definitely tedious but difficult. My only criticism is the instructions a VERY basic and you may end up putting a piece on backwards. If you take anything from this review, HAND TIGHTEN EVERYTHING UNTIL COMPLETELY FINISHED!!!!!!! You’ll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Just built this “work station”. Pulled out the drawer to start putting tools in it and the drawer falls out. Cheap material. Def not worth the money. Highly not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Clif

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This item had to be reordered because it came broken the first time. Its extremely cumbersome to get it assembled. My dad and fiancé help me put it together. Still took is close to 2 hrs. It serves its purpose but next time i will spend a little more in another item.
customer_reviews.author: YoYo

customer_reviews.title: Love this workbench!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this for his Father's Day present, along with the hooks & baskets. We had an enjoyable afternoon in his garage putting it together!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M. Bowe

customer_reviews.title: Not very well terminations
customer_reviews.text: It is not bad but it is not the best. In my case the 2 tables needed to be forced to fit the structure. Also, the upper cover came damaged, where the light is attached.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your parts before assembly!
customer_reviews.text: I received two sets of the 10L drawer sides, and none of the 10R. This means no drawers. Amazon customer support was useless. They wanted me to disassemble the entire workbench to return it. Check your parts before you start putting it together! Otherwise I love the bench. Everything I expected it to be. Hopefully the folks at Olympia will see this and help me out with the parts issue?
customer_reviews.author: Randy P

customer_reviews.title: Nice in the garage
customer_reviews.text: Great smaller work bench for the 2 car garage, does not take up a ton of room. Holds a decent amount of tools and functionable. Some assembly required means a good few hours.
customer_reviews.author: gina damuth

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Good but not grate, holes were not evenly along on the left side drawer tray so the mounts were to far apart so I could only safely install one of the drawers, other than that it's a great work be ch for projects.
customer_reviews.author: Dred

customer_reviews.title: Nice workbench
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy workbench will lots of room for tools and such, but the instructions could have been a little bit easier to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Brayall

customer_reviews.title: Great for light projects
customer_reviews.text: I had this table for about 3 months now. Purchased this for my bonsai garden work. Took me like 3 hours+ to put it together, not very easy to do so.... Once assembled it looks great does all task for what I want. I mainly stage plants for bonsai on it. I gave this an overall rating of 5 stars due to great price and does the job of what I purchase it for, and 3 star for assemble and Sturdiness. I would not use this as a heavy duty workshop table. light projects, yes its great...... Heavy project you would need a $500 workshop table...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old son And I put it together.... great father and son time during covid-19 lockdown... took the time to clean the garage, hang tools and make room for the bench. Very sturdy. Only complaint was the directions. I had to guess what screws to use first. Just know that the bag with the most screw is what’s used for everything up until you put the peg board on. Then follow directions for what screws to use. Other then that, I am very impressed...
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: This was a fun project.
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun project....... if you like spending 4 hours building a desk and screwing things...... get your head out the gutter! Aside from the long build its a great work bench I use for my RC hobby! Somehow the first one I ordered never arrived but Amazon had one to my house within a day so it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: holes don’t match-up. flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: not up to quality level one expects from Amazon-pre-drilled holes don’t match up properly, very flimsy product. I was exceedingly careful during construction to no avail. Suggest another product.
customer_reviews.author: Dale L. Burks

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this bench for himself to put in our new home. We haven't had a basement for years, so it was a treat. It's just the right size, not to big, not too small. The surface has a slick, attractive but durable finish, and the drawers slide smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Consistent shipment damage (2 work benches ordered)
customer_reviews.text: Both table tops and the peg board were damaged on the corners. I ordered 2 work benches and both peg boards were broken in upper right corner where you install screw. I could not install screw because of damage. Both table tops were damaged (both shipments) in opposite corners. The damage is acceptable in that the work benches will still serve their purpose. But packaging needs to be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Huff

customer_reviews.title: Too many pieces
customer_reviews.text: Too many screws and nuts; peg board holes are small If I knew the amount of work assembling and a couple manufacturing flaws, I would have spend the extra $100 for a better table
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Was pretty easy to assemble, good workbench
customer_reviews.text: Took around 3 hours to put together but instructions were pretty good. Sturdy, I saw wood off of the edge, holds up well
customer_reviews.author: Sleepystar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: You would be better off to buy locally - this was missing screws and is so flimsy we had to add wood to reinforce - Definitely not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Daniel newton

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bench went together well and looks great! Seems sturdy enough for light to medium use in a small home garage. My only complaints would be the instructions being a little vague towards the end, and the bench top seems easy to chip up/scratch.
customer_reviews.author: TM1NE

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap work bench.
customer_reviews.text: This thing took me forever to put together, but it came out great. The assembly instructions were unclear or hard to follow at times, but there is a full diagram in the back showing every part and how they are connected. I'm still giving it 5 stars though, because aside from the assembly, everything else is great. It's really sturdy, has a light, a pegboard, and a power strip. For a work bench around $100, this is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Jeffries

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and generally awful. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely flimsy, wobbly, unstable and impossible to put together. Many of the parts did not fit, were not labeled, and did not sit flush to the other parts.
